data.title: Mary Lee Jones
data.text:
Bonham-Graveside services for Bonham-Graveside services for Mary Lee Jones, age 61 of Bonham, TX will be held at 2:00 pm on Saturday, April 26, 2014 at Oakridge Cemetery. Mr. Ricky Kirk will officiate the service. Mrs. Jones passed away on Monday, April 22, 2014 at her home.

Mary Lee (Peek) Jones was born on March 13, 1953 in Memphis, TX to Richard Lee and Arlie Edna (Woods) Peek. She married Alton Jones; he preceded her in death in 2005. She was a nurses aide for Seven Oaks Nursing Home.

She is survived by Sons-Alton Jones, Tracy Jones, and Joe David Jones; Daughter-Mary Taylor; 19 grandchildren, and 17 great grandchildren; Brother- Tommy Joe Peek; and Sisters- Sue Janzen, and Tammy Peek. She was also preceded in death by her parents, and Daughter- Candice Raney Jones.

No formal visitation will be held.

To convey condolences or sign an online registry, please visit www.coopersorrells.com
